Package edu.metrostate.ics370.grm.controller

Class Login

java.lang.Object
edu.metrostate.ics370.grm.controller.Login
public abstract class Login
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class provides new user functionality, signs into and out of the database. DAO for User class
Author:
skylar

    • signIn

      public static boolean signIn​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Validates username and password using database connection
      Parameters:
      username - username to search
      password - password to search
      Returns:
      true iff valid username and password
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - exception from the database

      Signs out user and returns true when done
      Returns:
      true when user is null
